channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: For the boomers that can actually afford to retire in the current climate, research reveals the best spots to kick up your feet
item.description: Retirees could settle down in sunny Cyprus, where rent for a 3-bedroom apartment in the city center is around $1,850.

item.title: Gen Alpha has surpassed $100 billion in spending power from side hustles and bankrolling parents—and Roblox and Nike are among the big winners
item.description: “This generation has more spending money than you'd think,” DKC President Matthew Traub said. “Their economic influence is enormous.”

item.title: The U.S. military is looking to buy Tesla Cybertrucks to use as missile targets
item.description: "It is likely the type of vehicles used by the enemy may transition to Tesla Cyber trucks."

item.title: What to know about Stephen Miran, the tariff proponent Trump just nominated to join the Fed’s board of governors
item.description: Miran is a rarity, a highly trained economist who makes a logical-sounding case for Trump’s stunningly contrarian game plan.

item.title: Why America’s jobs data may be getting it wrong
item.description: The rise of entrepreneurship and AI-driven solopreneurs is reshaping the labor market—but U.S. data hasn’t caught up.

item.title: Under Armour shares slump 20% in premarket trades after weak outlook
This year’s U.S. Open prize purse is the biggest in tennis history
Economic calendar: Further thoughts from Fed leaders as week winds down
U.S. stocks are racking up gains early Friday as gold surges — live updates
CEO doesn’t like what Trump’s tariffs are doing to Under Armour’s profits
